modName: Fix for -Follower- Saber from Fate Stay Nigh
summary: This is armor fix for -Follower- Saber from Fate Stay Night by ZReincarnation.
descriptionHtml:
Yo!

Actualy, this fix fixs problem, when Arturia gets... Errmm... splashed armor?..

This is for guys who hates console. Saber's weight went 0.

WARNING!! ATENTION!! THIS IS !!=-=FIX=-= for Fizban007's armor version!!

First, Install original mode, then replace file FollowerSaber.esp.
Original:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21650/
-Follower- Saber from Fate Stay Night by ZReincarnation
For version 1.1fix.
author: Tamashii SIppo
